title: Shrek_1_-_2001_Double_Farsi_1080p_ mkv
description:
Shrek is a green ogre who lives in a swamp alone by himself his swamp is later taken over by fairy tale stories and he meets a donkey and they both go on a adventure to save a princess for a short man named Lord Farquaad who wants to be king.
Also this is the official Persian Dub of the film from Iran  hope you guys enjoy please seed and share thank you.
